name: BHCircularCalendar
summary: BHCircularCalendar allows you to get Circular Calendar View In Swift.
description: BHCircularCalendar works on all orientations and with any screen resolution. It will provide you Left/Right smooth scrolling for changing dates. There are also nice optional features allowing you to chang colors of the dates, Circle View, Month and Year Label. Also you can set the layout and fonts and do much more modification with the calendar as you need. It is having reset button enable disable option which will help you to jump on the current date.
